description: An optional filter that can be used when retrieving team members to only get certain types of members. Defaults to "ALL".

enum.name: ADMIN
enum.description: Retrieve only administrators of a team (i.e. team managers).

enum.name: MEMBER
enum.description: Retrieve regular members of a team (those who are not team administrators).

enum.name: ALL
enum.description: Retrieve all members of a team. This is the default option, if this parameter is null.
